name: 500 Years to Cossack settlements. Kalmiuska palanqua
generalDescription: The coin is dedicated to 500 Years to Ukrainian Cossack settlements on the territory of the present Donetsk and Luhansk regions, which established later Kalmiuska palanqua (administrative district) of Zaporizhia Army situated down stream.
averseDescription: On the coin obverse there is depicted a conventionalized coat of arms of Zaporizhia Army, left from which there is the small National emblem of Ukraine; 2005, the coin issue year (beneath) and the circular inscriptions: НАЦІОНАЛЬНИЙ БАНК УКРАЇНИ (National Bank of Ukraine) (above), П`ЯТЬ ГРИВЕНЬ (5/ hryvnia) (beneath), as well as the NBU Mint logotype
reverseDescription: On the coin reverse there is a depiction of a Cossack community headed by a foreman; left there is a stone idol of Polovtsi tribe; under the composition there is a coat of arms of Kalmiuska palanqua. Around the coin circumference there are inscriptions: 500 РОКІВ КОЗАЦЬКИМ ПОСЕЛЕННЯМ. КАЛЬМІУСЬКА ПАЛАНКА (500 Years to Cossack settlements, Kalmiuska palanqua).
